Articles.Content: I accidentally found out that when adjusting a maneuver node, when the icon you wish to adjust is highlighted, you can mouse wheel scroll up or down to fine tune it, Im sure many of you know this already, but maybe theres a few that dont and find this helpfull.

From the readme.txt in your KSP install (line 191):

* Maneuver handles can now be fine-tweaked with the mousewheel when hovering over them.

I know the readme is for dummies, but I'm sure other goodies can be found reading it.
